projectsData.title: Airplane Above
projectsData.description: This project shows the closest aircraft to your location. It uses the OpenSky API to get the aircraft data.

projectsData.title: Wes's Cozy Kitchen
projectsData.description: A single player breakfast ingredient choosing game developed using pygame featuring a retro theme and chill gameplay with a focus on the player's choice of ingredients and how they affect the breakfast meal chosen by the Chef.

projectsData.title: Airbnb Clone
projectsData.description: This is a clone of AirBnB from scratch. It is a fullstack application that uses a MySQL database to store data. It uses Flask to serve the backend and Jinja to render the frontend.

projectsData.title: Hexclock
projectsData.description: Created a hexclock that changes the background color based on the time of day.

projectsData.title: Museum of Imagination
projectsData.description: This is a custom frontend design from scratch utilizing three.js to create a 3D environment. Built in 10 days

projectsData.title: Simple Shell
projectsData.description: A simple shell that can execute commands, handle arguments, and handle the PATH environment variable.

projectsData.title: Frog_Chat
projectsData.description: A quickly made chat app to allow the user to interact with a frog. Built in a coule hours.

projectsData.title: Drone Build
projectsData.description: Building a drone from scratch. This is a work in progress.
